text:
Ashraf Ghani Ahmadzai (, born February 12, 1949) is President of Afghanistan. He became President of Afghanistan on 29 September 2014. He was elected as the President of Afghanistan on 21 September 2014.
Life.
Ghani was born on February 12, 1949. On May 2, 2008, he made his first book, called. In 2011, he made another book, titled
